nodes.text: Hu Jibwe was a scholar of military history, employed at the Salmagodro Grand Academy during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Some time after 15 BBY, Jibwe spoke with Imperial Center Today contributor Eschul Shaywa, and discussed the Mandalorian Dha Werda Verda chant's history and composition. A quote of Jibwe was later included in Shaywa's completed article, "The Zhell and the Taungs Are Names to Conjure By, But the Truth About These Long-Lost Combatants Is Hard to Pin Down."
Hu Jibwe was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the second installment of Jason Fry's official Star Wars Blog series, The Essential Guide to Warfare: Author's Cut, entitled "Ancient Coruscant."
